summary:
I have worked for many years in the IT in several functions at different companies/departments with different needs. In my career I have always been involved in IT projects. As a project manager I have many years of experience in managing complex IT projects with a strong focus on the IT infrastructure. 

I am a people person with a ‘can do’ attitude for setting and achieving goals. I am always curious, I am flexible and my creativity provides in an alternative when needed. Together with my mediator skills, strong focus and ability to bring structure I have delivered many solutions for many problems.

Knowledge in methodologies / Expertise: Prince2, InFraMe, IPMA-C, ITIL, PCI-DSS, PCI-PIN, PCI-CP physical & logical, SOC, GDRM, IT infrastructure architecture / security

school.name: De Haagse Hogeschool / The Hague University of Applied Sciences

profile_positions.description:
equensWorldline is an international company for payments and card processing with many connections to many banks and retailers throughout Europe.

Currently I am responsible for a project in which we migrate all France and Belgium customers (>2500) to a new file transfer gateway based on SFT (IBM SI) and a project in which I will setup the SOC (Security Operating Center) for equensWorldline and Worldline (incl. security monitoring with our SIEM based on Q-Radar).

In 2016/2017 I finished an upgrade project in which all java applications (105) were upgraded to the next WebSphere version, I finished a compliancy project ensuring the quality equensWorldline stands for in solving open audit points for PCI-PIN and PCI-CP physycal & logical requirements and I delivered a new project start-up / strategy for consolidating the operational SWIFT service bureaus (migration of the SSB operational in Frankfurt and Milan towards the SSB operational in Brussels)

In 2015/2016 I implemented IPsoft monitoring tooling (IPcenter) at Equens SE which monitors the Equens infrastructure now. And I delivered a project start-up for consolidation of the SWIFT infrastructure in Germany and Italy.

In 2014 I finished the project for security (proxy) solution all C-TAP transaction (Cards payment transaction) will pass before they are authorized on the host and a project in which I coordinated a project study for simplify and restructuring all customer access.

In January 2013 I successfully finished the project in which I implemented an international WAN for dedicated connections (MPLS network of Verizon) between all main offices and all data centers of Equens.

Apart from managing projects I have also been involved in introducing the InFraMe methodology,  several improvements for the requirements process, (project) delivery process, project intake, project templates internally used and implementation of the project management intranet site.
profile_positions.title: Senior Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
2012: Project start for new proxy solution all C-TAP transaction (Cards payment transaction) will pass before they are authorized on the host. This includes a solution for all payment transactions coming from Internet.

2012: Project start implementing an international WAN for dedicated connections (MPLS network of Verizon) to all main offices and all data centers of Equens.

2009 -2011: Started and succesfully finished the HP NonStop consolidation project in which I have delivered a new HP NonStop Blade Itanium platform and migrated the entire Dutch Cards application products to this new platform. A platform customers in NL and Italy are using through over 700.000 point of sale terminals.

As from 2009 I have stopped my IT consultancy tasks.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
As a project manager I was responsible for many network related projects like; 
- Consolidation of IT infrastructure locations (from 8 to 3 locations) including re-arrange of dial number of approx 180.000 point of sale terminals
- Consolidation of many Equens different payment infrastructures into one Equens IT infrastructure (implementation of layered architecture with different security zones)
- Firewall consolidation
- New fibre optic backbone for the Dutch infrastructure in NL (Dark Fibre implementation)
- Migration of the complete IT network infrastructure to new data centres (outsourcing internal datacenters)

As an IT consultant I was responsible for 
- The network roadmap 
- Customer related changes (connectivity, access-points, protocol), 
- Implementation of InFraMe for use in IT projects 
- Set up of an demand service organisation with main focus on the processes needed for project management and portal to resources of engineering
profile_positions.title: Project Manager and IT Consultant network infrastructure

profile_positions.description: Responsible for the continuity of the Equens IT network infrastructure. Also different project participation for a new report tool, management network, migration from X.25 to TCP/IP, configuration database and project coordination of the migration of the data room with all external connections of Equens.
profile_positions.title: Network Manager

profile_positions.description: Responsible for the local IT network of the Leids Universitair Medisch Centrum (Hospital with University). Migration to new local network, set-up of IT monitoring, set-up of remote-access, customer support, etcetera.
profile_positions.title: Network Specialist

profile_positions.description: Customer support remote and onsite at customers related to the satellite products of Mobicom (communication software, satellite dishes, education). The customers in the Netherlands and Belgium were mainly trucking companies which used the satellite equipment for international tracking of the company trucks.
profile_positions.title: Customer Support Engineer (Mobicom)

profile_positions.description: Customer support, problem solving of complex problems related to the large (international) IT network infrastructures of different customers of Alcatel.
profile_positions.title: TAC Engineer

profile_positions.description: Installation, configuration, problem solving on large (international) IT network infrastructures of different customers of Alcatel in the Netherlands and Belgium.
profile_positions.title: Service Engineer
